# g6R

![g6R hex logo](./reference/figures/hex.png)

[g6R](https://github.com/cynkra/g6R) provides R bindings to the G6 graph
[library](https://g6.antv.antgroup.com/en). It allows to create
interactive network in R, with stunning set of features, including:

- Support for various **layouts**, such as force-directed, radial,
  circular, and hierarchical layouts.
- Interactive **behaviors** like zooming, dragging, and selecting
  elements.
- **Plugins** for additional functionality, such as minimaps and
  tooltips, context menus, and node grouping features like bubble sets,
  hulls and legends.
- Various **data sources** including data frames, lists and remote JSON
  urls.
- Support for **combos** allowing for **nested** nodes.
- High **performance** rendering (\>20000 nodes).

![g6R layers example](./reference/figures/g6-layers.png)

``` r
shinyAppDir(system.file("examples", "demo", package = "g6R"))
```

## Installation

You can install the development version of
[g6R](https://github.com/cynkra/g6R) from [GitHub](https://github.com/)
with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("cynkra/g6R")
```

## Example

To create a [g6R](https://github.com/cynkra/g6R) graph:

``` r
library(g6R)
nodes <- data.frame(id = 1:10)

# Generate random edges
edges <- data.frame(
  source = c(2, 6, 7),
  target = c(1, 3, 9)
)

g6(nodes, edges) |>
  g6_options(
    node = list(
      style = list(
        labelBackground = TRUE,
        labelBackgroundFill = '#FFB6C1',
        labelBackgroundRadius = 4,
        labelFontFamily = 'Arial',
        labelPadding = c(0, 4),
        labelText = JS(
          "(d) => {
            return d.id
        }"
        )
      )
    )
  ) |>
  g6_layout(d3_force_layout()) |>
  g6_behaviors(
    "zoom-canvas",
    drag_element_force(fixed = TRUE),
    click_select(
      multiple = TRUE,
      onClick = JS(
        "(e) => {
            console.log(e);
          }"
      )
    ),
    brush_select(),
    create_edge()
  ) |>
  g6_plugins(
    "minimap",
    "tooltip",
    context_menu()
  )
```

# Package index

## Initialize

### g6

Initialize a g6 network

- [`g6()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6.md) : Create a G6
  Graph Visualization

### Shiny

Render g6 instance in a Shiny app

- [`g6Output()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-shiny.md)
  [`g6_output()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-shiny.md)
  [`renderG6()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-shiny.md)
  [`render_g6()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-shiny.md) :
  Shiny bindings for g6

### igraph

Render an igraph object as g6

- [`g6_igraph()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_igraph.md) :
  Create a G6 Graph from an igraph Object

## Data

Create g6 data structures and validate them

### Create atomic elements

- [`g6_node()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_element.md)
  [`g6_edge()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_element.md)
  [`g6_combo()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_element.md)
  [`validate_element()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_element.md)
  : G6 Graph Elements
- [`is_g6_node()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/is_g6_element.md)
  [`is_g6_edge()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/is_g6_element.md)
  [`is_g6_combo()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/is_g6_element.md)
  : Check if an object is a G6 element
- [`as_g6_node()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/as_g6_element.md)
  [`as_g6_edge()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/as_g6_element.md)
  [`as_g6_combo()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/as_g6_element.md)
  : Coerce to a g6 element object
- [`g6_collapse_options()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_collapse_options.md)
  [`is_g6_collapse_options()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_collapse_options.md)
  : Configure collapse button for nodes

### Create list of g6 elements

- [`g6_data()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_data.md)
  [`as_g6_data()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_data.md) :
  Create a g6_data object
- [`is_g6_data()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/is_g6_data.md)
  : Check if an object is a g6_data object
- [`g6_nodes()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_elements.md)
  [`g6_edges()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_elements.md)
  [`g6_combos()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_elements.md)
  [`validate_elements()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_elements.md)
  [`as_g6_nodes(`*`<g6_nodes>`*`)`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_elements.md)
  [`as_g6_nodes(`*`<data.frame>`*`)`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_elements.md)
  [`as_g6_nodes(`*`<list>`*`)`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_elements.md)
  : Create and validate lists of G6 elements
- [`is_g6_nodes()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/is_g6_elements.md)
  [`is_g6_edges()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/is_g6_elements.md)
  [`is_g6_combos()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/is_g6_elements.md)
  : Check if an object is a list of G6 elements
- [`as_g6_nodes()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/as_g6_elements.md)
  [`as_g6_edges()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/as_g6_elements.md)
  [`as_g6_combos()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/as_g6_elements.md)
  : Coerce to a list of g6_elements objects

## Ports

Create and validate G6 ports

- [`g6_port()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_port.md)
  [`g6_input_port()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_port.md)
  [`g6_output_port()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_port.md)
  : Create a G6 Port
- [`g6_ports()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_ports.md) :
  Create a List of G6 Ports
- [`is_g6_port()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/is_g6_port.md)
  [`is_g6_ports()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/is_g6_port.md)
  : Check if an object is a g6_port
- [`as_g6_port()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/as_g6_port.md)
  : Coerce to a g6_port object
- [`as_g6_ports()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/as_g6_ports.md)
  : Coerce to a list of g6_port objects (g6_ports)
- [`validate_port()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/validate_port.md)
  : Validate a single G6 port
- [`validate_ports()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/validate_ports.md)
  : Validate a list of G6 ports
- [`validate_edges_ports()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/validate_edges_ports.md)
  : Validate that all edges connect input/output ports

## Proxy

Update a g6 instance from the server function of a Shiny app

### Setup

Setup a g6 proxy

- [`g6_proxy()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_proxy.md) :
  Create a proxy object to modify an existing g6 graph instance

### Add elements

Add elements to a g6 instance

- [`g6_add_nodes()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-add.md)
  [`g6_add_edges()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-add.md)
  [`g6_add_combos()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-add.md)
  [`g6_add_data()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-add.md) :
  Add nodes/edges/combos to a g6 graph via proxy
- [`g6_add_plugin()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_add_plugin.md)
  : Add a plugin to a g6 graph via proxy

### Remove elements

Remove elements from a g6 instance

- [`g6_remove_nodes()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-remove.md)
  [`g6_remove_edges()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-remove.md)
  [`g6_remove_combos()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-remove.md)
  : Remove nodes/edge/combos from a g6 graph via proxy

### Update elements

Update elements from a g6 instance

- [`g6_update_nodes()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-update.md)
  [`g6_update_edges()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-update.md)
  [`g6_update_combos()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-update.md)
  : Update nodes/edges/combos to a g6 graph via proxy

### Get elements

Get elements state from a g6 instance

- [`g6_get_nodes()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-get.md)
  [`g6_get_edges()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-get.md)
  [`g6_get_combos()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-get.md)
  : Get the state of nodes/edges/combos in a g6 graph via proxy

### Select elements

Select elements state from a g6 instance

- [`g6_set_nodes()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-set.md)
  [`g6_set_edges()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-set.md)
  [`g6_set_combos()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-set.md)
  [`g6_set_data()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-set.md) :
  Set the state of nodes/edges/combos in a g6 graph via proxy

### Canvas

canvas util function

- [`g6_canvas_resize()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_canvas_resize.md)
  : Resize the canvas of a g6 graph via proxy
- [`g6_fit_center()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_fit_center.md)
  : Center graph

### Elements actions

elements actions

- [`g6_focus_elements()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-focus.md)
  [`g6_focus_nodes()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-focus.md)
  [`g6_focus_edges()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-focus.md)
  [`g6_focus_combos()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-focus.md)
  : Focus on specific elements in a g6 graph via proxy
- [`g6_hide_elements()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-element-toggle.md)
  [`g6_hide_nodes()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-element-toggle.md)
  [`g6_hide_edges()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-element-toggle.md)
  [`g6_hide_combos()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-element-toggle.md)
  [`g6_show_elements()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-element-toggle.md)
  [`g6_show_nodes()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-element-toggle.md)
  [`g6_show_edges()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-element-toggle.md)
  [`g6_show_combos()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-element-toggle.md)
  : Hide/show elements in a g6 graph
- [`g6_collapse_combo()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-combo-action.md)
  [`g6_expand_combo()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6-combo-action.md)
  : Collapse or expand a combo element in a g6 graph

### Others

Others

- [`g6_add_plugin()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_add_plugin.md)
  : Add a plugin to a g6 graph via proxy
- [`g6_set_options()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_set_options.md)
  : Set options for a g6 graph via proxy
- [`g6_update_plugin()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_update_plugin.md)
  : Update a plugin in a g6 graph via proxy
- [`g6_update_behavior()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_update_behavior.md)
  : Update a behavior in a g6 graph via proxy
- [`g6_update_ports()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_update_ports.md)
  : Update ports for one or more nodes in a g6 graph via proxy
- [`g6_get_ports()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/get-ports.md)
  [`g6_get_input_ports()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/get-ports.md)
  [`g6_get_output_ports()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/get-ports.md)
  : Extract ports from a g6 graph state via proxy

## Layout

Graph layout

- [`g6_layout()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_layout.md) :
  Set the layout algorithm for a g6 graph
- [`g6_update_layout()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_update_layout.md)
  : Execute layout for a g6 graph via proxy
- [`antv_dagre_layout()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/antv_dagre_layout.md)
  : Generate G6 AntV Dagre layout configuration
- [`circular_layout()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/circular_layout.md)
  : Generate G6 AntV circular layout configuration
- [`compact_box_layout()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/compact_box_layout.md)
  : Generate G6 AntV Compact Box layout configuration
- [`concentric_layout()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/concentric_layout.md)
  : Generate G6 AntV Concentric layout configuration
- [`d3_force_layout()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/d3_force_layout.md)
  : Generate G6 D3 Force layout configuration
- [`dagre_layout()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/dagre_layout.md)
  : Generate G6 AntV Dagre layout configuration
- [`dendrogram_layout()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/dendrogram_layout.md)
  : Generate G6 Dendrogram layout configuration
- [`force_atlas2_layout()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/force_atlas2_layout.md)
  : Generate G6 Force Atlas2 layout configuration
- [`fruchterman_layout()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/fruchterman_layout.md)
  : Generate G6 Fruchterman layout configuration
- [`radial_layout()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/radial_layout.md)
  : Generate G6 Radial layout configuration
- [`combo_combined_layout()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/combo_combined_layout.md)
  : Create an AntV Combo Combined Layout

## Options

g6 options

- [`g6_options()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_options.md)
  : Configure Global Options for G6 Graph
- [`node_options()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/node_options.md)
  : Create Node Options Configuration for G6 Graphs
- [`node_style_options()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/node_style_options.md)
  : Create Node Style Options for G6 Graphs
- [`edge_options()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/edge_options.md)
  : Create Edge Options Configuration for G6 Graphs
- [`edge_style_options()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/edge_style_options.md)
  : Create Edge Style Options for G6 Graphs
- [`combo_options()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/combo_options.md)
  : Create Combo Options Configuration for G6 Graphs
- [`auto_fit_config()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/auto_fit_config.md)
  : Create Auto-Fit Configuration for G6 Graphs
- [`canvas_config()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/canvas_config.md)
  : Create Canvas Configuration for G6 Graphs
- [`animation_config()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/animation_config.md)
  : Create Animation Configuration for G6 Graphs
- [`g6_set_theme()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_set_theme.md)
  : Set the theme for a g6 graph via proxy

## R options

Custom global options

- [`set_g6_max_collapse_depth()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/set_g6_max_collapse_depth.md)
  : Set max collapse depth

## Behaviors

Container for behavior elements

- [`g6_behaviors()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_behaviors.md)
  : Create G6 Graph Behaviors Configuration

### Navigation behaviors

Navigation behaviors

- [`drag_canvas()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/drag_canvas.md)
  : Configure Drag Canvas Behavior
- [`optimize_viewport_transform()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/optimize_viewport_transform.md)
  : Configure Optimize Viewport Transform Behavior
- [`scroll_canvas()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/scroll_canvas.md)
  : Configure Scroll Canvas Behavior
- [`zoom_canvas()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/zoom_canvas.md)
  : Configure Zoom Canvas Behavior

### Selection behaviors

Selection behaviors

- [`brush_select()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/brush_select.md)
  : Configure Brush Selection Interaction
- [`click_select()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/click_select.md)
  : Configure Click Select Behavior
- [`lasso_select()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/lasso_select.md)
  : Configure Lasso Select Behavior

### Editing behaviors

Editing behaviors

- [`create_edge()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/create_edge.md)
  : Configure Create Edge Behavior
- [`drag_element()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/drag_element.md)
  : Configure Drag Element Behavior
- [`drag_element_force()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/drag_element_force.md)
  : Configure Drag Element Force Behavior

### Data Exploration behaviors

Data Exploration behaviors

- [`collapse_expand()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/collapse_expand.md)
  : Configure Collapse Expand Behavior
- [`focus_element()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/focus_element.md)
  : Configure Focus Element Behavior
- [`hover_activate()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/hover_activate.md)
  : Configure Hover Activate Behavior

### Visual Optimization behaviors

Visual Optimization behaviors

- [`auto_adapt_label()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/auto_adapt_label.md)
  : Configure Auto Adapt Label Behavior
- [`fix_element_size()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/fix_element_size.md)
  : Configure Fix Element Size Behavior

## Plugins

Container for plugin elements

- [`g6_plugins()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/g6_plugins.md)
  : Create a List of G6 Plugins

### Visual Style Enhancement

Enrich the graph style

- [`background()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/background.md)
  : Configure Background Plugin for G6
- [`bubble_sets()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/bubble_sets.md)
  : Configure Bubble Sets Plugin for G6
- [`grid_line()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/grid_line.md) :
  Configure Grid Line Plugin
- [`hull()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/hull.md) : Configure
  Hull Plugin
- [`snapline()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/snapline.md) :
  Configure Snapline Plugin
- [`watermark()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/watermark.md) :
  Configure Watermark Plugin

### Navigation and Overview

Navigation and Overview

- [`fullscreen()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/fullscreen.md)
  : Configure Fullscreen Plugin
- [`minimap()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/minimap.md) :
  Configure Minimap Plugin
- [`timebar()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/timebar.md) :
  Configure Timebar Plugin

### Interactive Controls

Interactive Controls

- [`context_menu()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/context_menu.md)
  : Configure Context Menu Behavior
- [`legend()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/legend.md) :
  Configure Legend Plugin
- [`toolbar()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/toolbar.md) :
  Configure Toolbar Plugin
- [`tooltips()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/tooltips.md) :
  Configure Tooltip Plugin

### Data Exploration

Data Exploration

- [`edge_bundling()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/edge_bundling.md)
  : Configure Edge Bundling Plugin
- [`edge_filter_lens()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/edge_filter_lens.md)
  : Configure Edge Filter Lens Plugin
- [`fish_eye()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/fish_eye.md) :
  Configure Fish Eye Plugin

### Advanced Features

Advanced Features

- [`history()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/history.md) :
  Configure History Plugin

## Miscellaneous

Utils function

- [`JS()`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/JS.md) : Marks as
  string to be processed as a JS function

## Example Data

Example Data

- [`dag`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/dag.md) : Example DAG
  graph
- [`lesmis`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/lesmis.md) :
  Character network from "Les miserables" novel
- [`radial`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/radial.md) : Example
  Network for radial layouts
- [`tree`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/tree.md) : Example
  tree graph
- [`poke`](https://cynkra.github.io/g6R/reference/poke.md) : Example
  pokemon data
